message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"please; to ask or invite someone politely","sentence":"请坐。","image_prompt":"A softly animated apocalypse-style scene showing a person politely gesturing to invite someone to sit on a simple chair. The background has subtle ruins and gentle light, but the mood is welcoming and polite. The words 请坐 are subtly included in the scene.","sentence_translation":"Please sit."}
